not sure if its implemented anywhere else, nor if its even true, but ive heard police officers say that they sometimes slant their gun in CQC to have more leverage were the target to attempt to grab it, which would make sense in a game like Back 4 Blood anyway.

So quick thing about the M1A sight rail. I’ve had one in the past with a rail like that. It’s not attached to the top of the handguard.  The handguard actually has a cutout in it and the rail attaches directly to the barrel so you won’t lose zero.
